[OBJECT:REACTION]
{V;
{REGISTER_REACTION_CLASS;MATERIAL_TEMPLATE:CREATURE_EXTRACT_TEMPLATE;EXTRACT}
{REGISTER_REACTION_CLASS;MATERIAL_TEMPLATE:PLANT_EXTRACT_TEMPLATE;EXTRACT}
}
{REACTION;SPATTER_ADD_OBJECT_LIQUID;ADDON_HOOK_PLAYABLE}
	[NAME:coat object with liquid]
	[ADVENTURE_MODE_ENABLED]
	[SKILL:WAX_WORKING]
	[REAGENT:extract:150:LIQUID_MISC:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[MIN_DIMENSION:150]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:extract container:1:NONE:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[CONTAINS:extract]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:object:1:NONE:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[CAN_USE_ARTIFACT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:grease:1:GLOB:NONE:NONE:NONE][REACTION_CLASS:FAT][UNROTTEN]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[IMPROVEMENT:800:object:COVERED:GET_MATERIAL_FROM_REAGENT:extract:NONE]

{REACTION;SPATTER_ADD_WEAPON_EXTRACT;ADDON_HOOK_PLAYABLE}
	[NAME:coat weapon with extract]
	[BUILDING:DFHACK_SPATTER_WORKSHOP:CUSTOM_W]
	[SKILL:WAX_WORKING]
	[REAGENT:extract:100:LIQUID_MISC:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[MIN_DIMENSION:100]
		[REACTION_CLASS:EXTRACT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:extract container:1:NONE:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[CONTAINS:extract]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:object:1:WEAPON:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[CAN_USE_ARTIFACT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:grease:1:GLOB:NONE:NONE:NONE][REACTION_CLASS:TALLOW][UNROTTEN]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[IMPROVEMENT:800:object:COVERED:GET_MATERIAL_FROM_REAGENT:extract:NONE]

{REACTION;SPATTER_ADD_AMMO_EXTRACT;ADDON_HOOK_PLAYABLE}
	[NAME:coat ammo with extract]
	[BUILDING:DFHACK_SPATTER_WORKSHOP:CUSTOM_A]
	[SKILL:WAX_WORKING]
	[REAGENT:extract:50:LIQUID_MISC:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[MIN_DIMENSION:50]
		[REACTION_CLASS:EXTRACT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:extract container:1:NONE:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[CONTAINS:extract]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:object:1:AMMO:NONE:NONE:NONE]
		[PRESERVE_REAGENT]
		[MIN_DIMENSION:5]
		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
	[REAGENT:grease:1:GLOB:NONE:NONE:NONE]

		[DOES_NOT_DETERMINE_PRODUCT_AMOUNT]
